column4: I'm going to toss this ubuntu hard drive onto another computer with all new hardware, will there be any problems moving it over?
You might have problems with the loaded drivers and the right hardware.
will i need to reinstall ubuntu from scratch?

If you know what you're doing then you can do it. Otherwise you'll just format your / partition and start over on that but keep your home partition. I hope you partitioned your /home seperately to back things up.
